statements: SELECT * FROM MalwareBehavior;
SELECT malware_name, behavior_pattern FROM MalwareBehavior WHERE malware_id = 1;
SELECT analyst_name, detection_date FROM MalwareBehavior WHERE malware_name = 'Ransomware' ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT malware_id, malware_name FROM MalwareBehavior WHERE analyst_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM MalwareBehavior WHERE behavior_pattern LIKE '%virus%' ORDER BY malware_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM MalwareBehavior WHERE malware_id = 1;
SELECT malware_name, behavior_pattern FROM MalwareBehavior WHERE detection_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT analyst_name, malware_name FROM MalwareBehavior ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MalwareBehavior WHERE behavior_pattern LIKE '%spread%';
SELECT DISTINCT analyst_name FROM MalwareBehavior;
SELECT * FROM malware_behavior_patterns;
SELECT malware_id, behavioral_pattern FROM malware_behavior_patterns ORDER BY behavioral_pattern DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_affiliation FROM malware_researchers WHERE researcher_affiliation = 'Cybersecurity Institute';
SELECT * FROM malware_behavior_patterns WHERE malware_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM malware_researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM malware_behavior_patterns WHERE behavioral_pattern='DDoS Attack';
SELECT malware_id, behavioral_pattern FROM malware_behavior_patterns ORDER BY malware_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_affiliation FROM malware_researchers WHERE researcher_affiliation='University College London' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM malware_behavior_patterns mbp JOIN malware_researchers mr ON mbp.malware_id = mr.researcher_id WHERE mr.researcher_name='John Doe';
SELECT DISTINCT researcher_affiliation FROM malware_researchers;
SELECT * FROM malware_samples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM malware_samples;
SELECT behavior_id, pattern_name, pattern_description FROM behavior_patterns;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM malware_samples WHERE behavior_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM malware_samples JOIN behavior_patterns ON malware_samples.sample_id = behavior_patterns.sample_id;

SELECT researchers.researcher_id, researchers.researcher_name, COUNT(behavior_patterns.behavior_id) AS num_behaviors FROM researchers LEFT JOIN behavior_patterns ON researchers.researcher_id = behavior_patterns.sample_id GROUP BY researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT sample_name, behavior_description FROM malware_samples WHERE sample_id = 2;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 4;

SELECT sample_name, pattern_name, pattern_description FROM malware_samples JOIN behavior_patterns ON malware_samples.sample_id = behavior_patterns.sample_id ORDER BY behavior_patterns.behavior_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM malware_files;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM malware_files WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT pattern_name, detection_rate FROM malware_patterns ORDER BY detection_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT behavior_name, behavior_description FROM malware_behaviors WHERE behavior_id = 3;
SELECT file_name, result_score FROM malware_files INNER JOIN malware_analysis_results ON malware_files.file_id = malware_analysis_results.file_id WHERE result_score > 0.8;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM malware_files WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT pattern_name, detection_rate FROM malware_patterns ORDER BY detection_rate DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_name, behavior_description FROM malware_behaviors;

SELECT file_name, pattern_name, result_score FROM malware_files f JOIN malware_analysis_results r ON f.file_id = r.file_id JOIN malware_patterns p ON r.pattern_id = p.pattern_id WHERE result_score > 0.8 ORDER BY result_score DESC;

SELECT fp.file_name, mb.behavior_name, mr.analysis_date FROM malware_files fp JOIN malware_analysis_results mr ON fp.file_id = mr.file_id JOIN malware_patterns mp ON mr.pattern_id = mp.pattern_id JOIN malware_behaviors mb ON mp.behavior_id = mb.behavior_id WHERE mr.analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY mr.analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MalwareBehavior;
SELECT malware_id, behavior_description FROM MalwareBehavior WHERE severity_level > 5;
SELECT analysis_id, malware_id, analysis_timestamp FROM MalwareAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_timestamp DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, affiliation FROM ResearcherInfo WHERE researcher_email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT malware_name, malware_family FROM MalwareTypes WHERE first_appearance > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MalwareBehavior WHERE malware_id = 1;
SELECT behavior_description, severity_level FROM MalwareBehavior WHERE severity_level > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT MalwareTypes.malware_name, ResearcherInfo.researcher_name FROM MalwareTypes JOIN MalwareBehavior ON MalwareTypes.type_id = MalwareBehavior.malware_id JOIN ResearcherInfo ON MalwareBehavior.malware_id = ResearcherInfo.researcher_id;
SELECT pattern_description, pattern_score FROM BehavioralPatterns WHERE related_malware_id = 2 ORDER BY pattern_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM MalwareAnalysis WHERE malware_id = 3 AND analysis_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_timestamp ASC;
